bibl.title: Notes on Papyri Relating to Claudia Isidora Also Called Apia. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Re-examines the twenty or so papyri already published which relate to Claudia Isidora also known as Apia or which may do so, especially their dates [1st half of the IIIrd cent. A.D., Oxyrhynchite nome]. - P. Med. Inv. 69.01 (= S.B. XVI, 12235); P. Robinson Inv. 4 (= S.B. XX, 14292).
bibl.seg: THOMAS J. David, Notes on Papyri Relating to Claudia Isidora Also Called Apia. Avec résumé en anglais.

145.4 B.G.U. XI, 2126 P. Col. X, 276 P. Fuad I Univ. App. II 118 P. Med. Inv. 69.01 P. Mich. XV, 707 P. Oxy. VI, 919; XII, 1530; 1577; 1578; XIV, 1630; 1634; 1659; XXXI, 2566; XLIII, 3118; XLIV, 3169 P. Robinson Inv. 4 P. Stras. 773 P. Yale I, 69 146
